Rainbow Days.name: Rainbow Days Easter Carnival
Rainbow Days.desc: Rainbow Days is a non-profit that works with underprivelaged children.  The carnival will provide a pleasant and happy atmosphere where the children can enjoy fun, games, comapnionship, and overall love from our LLUMC community.

Palm Sunday.name: Palm Sunday Worship
Palm Sunday.desc:
Traditional Worship: - 8:15am (Shipp Chapel), 10:50am (Sanctuary)
Crosswalk Contemporary Worship - 10:50am (Asbury Hall)
Thrive Family Worship - (9:30am Asbury Hall)

Children's Easter Eggstravaganza.name: Children's Easter Eggstravaganza
Children's Easter Eggstravaganza.desc: Invite friends & neighbors for this FREE family event, featuring an egg hunt, bounce house, carnival games & hot dog cookout. The festivities begin at 12:30, rain or shine. kids@llumc.org

Holy Week Organ Recital.name: Holy Week Organ Recital
Holy Week Organ Recital.desc: Featureing Sheryl Sebo - 12:00PM (Shipp Chapel) & Complimentary Lunch to Follow (Watson Hall).

Owen Lenten Lectures.name: Owen Lenten Lectures
Owen Lenten Lectures.desc:
Anual Holy Week lecture series presented by The Foundation of LLUMC
Featureing Dr. William D. Lawrence, Dean, Perkins School of Theology
Lecture - 12:00PM (Shipp Chapel); Complimentary lunch to follow in Watson Hall.

Renew Contemplative Worship.name: Renew Contemplative Worship
Renew Contemplative Worship.desc: Renew Contemplative worship & Holy Communion led by Dr. Ted Campbell Scott Gilliland in Shipp Chapel on Wednesdays.

Maundy Thursday Worship.name: Maundy Thursday Worship
Maundy Thursday Worship.desc: Maundy Thursday Worship led by our Crosswalk Worship Team - 630:pm in Asbury Hall.

Good Friday Worship.name: Good Friday Worship
Good Friday Worship.desc: Maundy Thursday Worship led by our Crosswalk Worship Team - 630:pm in Asbury Hall.

Handel's Messiah Concert.name: Handel's Messiah Concert
Handel's Messiah Concert.desc: Sanctuary Choir, Professional Orchestra and soloists. Reception will follow in Watson Hall featuring artwork by Sacred Threads of Glasgow, Scotland.

Holy Week Revival Meetings.name: Holy Week Revival Meetings
Holy Week Revival Meetings.desc: Multicultural praise, worship, & inspiration with guest speakers: Pastor Isaac Nganga, Pastor William Bittock, Pastor Emmie Mandari, and host Rev Jacob Keega.

Easter Worship.name: Easter Worship
Easter Worship.desc:
Sunrise Service - 7:00am (Shepherd's Garden)
Traditional Services - 8:00am, 9:30am & 11:00am (Sanctuary)
Crosswalk Contemporary Worship - 9:30am & 11:00am (Asbury Hall)
